treatment-md.article-title: A new species of Paracreptotrema (Digenea, Plagiorchiformes, Allocreadiidae) infecting two species of poeciliids in Rio Malila of the Rio Panuco basin, Hidalgo, Mexico, with a key to the species of the genus
